description: Creates a Fleet Advisor collector using the specified parameters.

parameters.name: CollectorName
parameters.description: The name of your Fleet Advisor collector (for example, sample-collector).

parameters.name: ServiceAccessRoleArn
parameters.description: The IAM role that grants permissions to access the specified Amazon S3 bucket.

parameters.name: S3BucketName
parameters.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that the Fleet Advisor collector uses to store inventory metadata.

nested_items.name: CollectorReferencedId
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the new Fleet Advisor collector, for example: 22fda70c-40d5-4acf-b233-a495bd8eb7f5

nested_items.name: CollectorName
nested_items.description: The name of the new Fleet Advisor collector.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A summary description of the Fleet Advisor collector.

nested_items.name: ServiceAccessRoleArn
nested_items.description: The IAM role that grants permissions to access the specified Amazon S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: S3BucketName
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 bucket that the collector uses to store inventory metadata.
